note: Juan Domingo Viveros Cartes in intercepted by the Uruguayan air force while trafficking 450 kg of marijuana
Sebastian Marset jailed as coauthor of a drug trafficking operations desmantled under Operation Falcon
Law Nº 19.172: MARIHUANA Y SUS DERIVADOS is passed
Marset released from prison
Marset charged with homicide
Marset enters Bolivia for the first time (making contacts)
Set up ~400 events as a concert promoter/worked as a singer, writer and producer
Gets Bolivian documents
Signs with Club Deportivo Capiatá
Plays his last game with Club Deportiive Capiatá
Leaves Paraguay for Dubai
Marset detained in Dubai for trying to enter the UAE with a false passport
Operation A Ultranza PY brings changes against 24 people, including Marset. Eight are initially arrested, including Alberto Koube Ayala
Interpol confirms Marset is no longer in Dubai
Paraguayan Prosecutor Marcelo Pecci is assassinated on his honeymoon in Barú, Colombia
Marset returns to Bolivia
Bolivian authories raid Marset's properties, but he escapes with his family
Erlan Ivar García López, alleged #2 in the org and pricipal supplier of drugs arrested in Bolivia
Elbio Horacio Perini Simonetta, who helped get drugs to Marset, is arrested in Boliva
Federico Ezequiel Santoro Vassallo, money man and Marset advisor, arrested in Paraguay
